name: Rooftop Fighters
description:
-If you play magic, yugioh or any popular game where you need to choose who goes first. And you got bored playing rock paper scissors. Fear not! Download this game and enjoy 1 on 1 battle to victory. Its short, it has action what more do you need?  And the best part this game its FREE!

-Many more maps coming! 

-With many more skins!

-This project was finished within a 5 days!
